title: MD
biography: Sir Magdi Yacoub is a Professor of Cardiothoracic Surgery at Imperial College London and a pioneering heart transplant surgeon. He performed the UK's first combined heart and lung transplant and is the founder of the Chain of Hope charity and the Magdi Yacoub Heart Foundation.
aiSummary: Magdi Yacoub is a Elite-tier (top 1%) cardiac surgery specialist with an H-index of 109 at Imperial College London (Professor of Cardiothoracic Surgery). Has been published in Global Cardiology Science and Practice, New England Journal of Medicine, Nature and recipient of the Knight Bachelor (1991). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
